purpose: To develop small, specialized agents that solve specific industrial problems using domain knowledge and AI.
principle: Combines domain-specific knowledge with AI to create neurosymbolic agents capable of addressing industrial challenges.
reusability: Designed for composability; can integrate with various industrial systems and processes. Provides extensible architecture for creating custom agents.
limitations: Early-stage development; may lack extensive documentation and community support. Limited to specific industrial use cases.
name: openssa
description: OpenSSA: Small Specialist Agents based on Domain-Aware Neurosymbolic Agent (DANA) architecture for industrial problem-solving
highlight: Specialist agents leveraging Domain-Aware Neurosymbolic Agent (DANA) architecture for industrial problem-solving
